link.title: Distant Learning
link.script:

h1.style: margin-left: 71px; margin-right: 71px; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

h3.style: margin-left: 71px; margin-right: 71px; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
h3.div: Golden Rule Charter Schools has compiled a plan for additional educational activities that families may use to keep students engaged in learning during this unprecedented event of school closure. Teachers will continue to contact and distribute information to our families about any classroom assignments. This is intended to be a resource for additional support to our community.

h3.style: margin-left: 71px; margin-right: 71px; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: Distance learning activities are organized by grade levels and may contain a combination of low tech and technology-based options across multiple subject areas.

h3.style: margin-left: 71px; margin-right: 71px; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
h3.div: Our goal is to help provide a structure for at-home learning so families have easy-to-implement activities that can prevent any learning loss during this closure.

h1.style: margin-left: 71px; margin-right: 71px; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 45px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 300; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

iframe.aria-label: YouTube Video, Google Classroom for Students

h2.style: margin-left: 71px; margin-right: 71px; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 25px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

h3.style: margin-left: 71px; margin-right: 71px; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
h3.div: Click the image above to play a video showing how students can access Google Classroom. After log-in students will be able to find materials posted by their instructors.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 71px; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 71px; margin-right: 71px; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

p.span: Instrucciones sobre Google Classroom para Estudiantes

h3.div: Click the image above to play a video showing how parents and teachers can connect on ClassDojo. After log-in parents will be able to find information posted by their instructors.
